name: include-all
description: An easy way to include all node.js modules within a directory.

0.0.0.name: include-all
0.0.0.description: An easy way to include all (or require all) files within a directory. Note: This is a fork of felixge's require-all which returns false instead of throwing an error if the directory doesn't exist.  This allows for optional includes, and relieves you from

0.0.1.name: include-all
0.0.1.description: An easy way to include all (or require all) files within a directory. Note: This is a fork of felixge's require-all which returns false instead of throwing an error if the directory doesn't exist.  This allows for optional includes, and relieves you from

0.0.2.name: include-all
0.0.2.description: An easy way to include all node.js modules within a directory.  This is a fork of felixge's awesome module, require-all (https://github.com/felixge/node-require-all) which adds the ability to mark an include as **optional**.

0.0.5.name: include-all
0.0.5.description: An easy way to include all node.js modules within a directory.  This is a fork of felixge's awesome module, require-all (https://github.com/felixge/node-require-all) which adds the ability to mark an include as **optional**.
